name: Navigator Chart Image Description File
summary: Learn about .CID files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Raster chart images typically come from scans of paper charts that are saved in the GIF, JPEG, or BMP format. Users can then import the GIF, JPG, or BMP file into Navigator with the ChartMaker tool that comes with Navigator. The CID file is created when the raster chart image is imported and is used to store information about the raster chart, which is then used by Navigator to display the chart to the user.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
